data.message: Thanks Facebook and Mr. Zuckerberg that you spreaded a very delightful and fast application for us. I believe that Facebook is one of the main networking site which have 90 % of social connecting facility than other. Hope that facebook will update more dashing and easier ways to be in touch with families and friends.

replies.message: Of course, Prasanna! We would also like to thank you for helping us become the community we are today. Here's to staying connected! -Rose
